[𠧪]
variant form of 卣

[卣]
Pictogram ( 象形 ). The enclosed component is written as 土 in bronze inscriptions but was later corrupted to become 仌 in the small seal script . Originally unrelated to 鹵 .

[鹵]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a bag of salt. Compare 西 , 東 , 束 , 熏 , and 柬 . Originally unrelated to 卣 and its variant 𠧪 .

[滷]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *raːʔ, *r̥ʰjaɡ, *l'eːɡ ) and ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): semantic 氵 + phonetic 鹵 ( OC *raːʔ ) .
